meanings.definition: The handle of a tool or weapon.
meanings.sent1: He tightly gripped the haft of the hammer.
meanings.sent2: The sword's haft was beautifully carved.
meanings.sent3: The haft of the axe told stories of battles won.
meanings.sent4: She swung the haft of the spear with precision.
meanings.sent5: The haft of the knife felt smooth in his hand.

meanings.definition: To fit a handle onto a tool or weapon.
meanings.sent1: He carefully hafted the blade onto the knife.
meanings.sent2: She hafted the axe securely before using it.
meanings.sent3: The blacksmith hafted the hammer skillfully.
meanings.sent4: They hafted the spear with great care.
meanings.sent5: Hafting the sword required patience and precision.
